revised_title:
Perturbation Calculation of Properties of the 2

State of HeH
tldr:
The authors conducted a perturbation calculation to study the properties of the 2

state of the helium hydride ion (HeH). They calculated the total energy, potential and kinetic energies, and dipole and quadrupole moments to analyze the behavior of the molecule at large nuclear separations. The results were compared with exact and variationally determined two-center wave functions, providing insights into the accuracy of approximate methods in molecular systems.
